org.esfinge.liveprog.monitor

Class FileFilterComposite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.esfinge.liveprog.monitor.FileFilterComposite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILiveClassFileFilter

    public class FileFilterComposite
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILiveClassFileFilter

    Permite encadear um conjunto de filtros para os arquivos monitorados.

    Allows to chain a set of file filters.

    See Also:
